channel.title: CVE Feed for VICIdial -- VICIdial
channel.description: The latest CVEs for VICIdial -- VICIdial

item.title: CVE-2022-34877|2024-08-03T09:22:10.821Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: SQL Injection vulnerability in AST Agent Time Sheet interface ((/vicidial/AST_agent_time_sheet.php) of VICIdial via the agent parameter allows attacker to spoof identity, tamper with existing data, allow the complete disclosure of all data on the system, destroy the data or make it otherwise unavailable, and become administrators of the database server. This issue affects: VICIdial 2.14b0.5 versions prior to 3555.

item.title: CVE-2022-34878|2024-08-03T09:22:10.629Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: SQL Injection vulnerability in User Stats interface (/vicidial/user_stats.php) of VICIdial via the file_download parameter allows attacker to spoof identity, tamper with existing data, allow the complete disclosure of all data on the system, destroy the data or make it otherwise unavailable, and become administrators of the database server.

item.title: CVE-2022-34876|2024-08-03T09:22:10.815Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: SQL Injection vulnerability in admin interface (/vicidial/admin.php) of VICIdial via modify_email_accounts, access_recordings, and agentcall_email parameters allows attacker to spoof identity, tamper with existing data, allow the complete disclosure of all data on the system, destroy the data or make it otherwise unavailable, and become administrators of the database server. This issue affects: VICIdial 2.14b0.5 versions prior to 3555.

item.title: CVE-2022-34879|2024-08-03T09:22:10.707Z -- vicidial -- vicidial
item.description: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in AST Agent Time Sheet interface (/vicidial/AST_agent_time_sheet.php) of VICIdial via agent, and search_archived_data parameters. This issue affects: VICIdial 2.14b0.5 versions prior to 3555.
